events.message: Hello, I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for days.
The reported issue appears to concern a delivery delay based on the customer's description of the late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
This case has been assigned to a delivery support agent who will assist with the delay inquiry.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your order delivery. I understand it is delayed, and I will look into this right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address to help me track down the issue with your delivery?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 789 Sunset Blvd, Springfield.
I have checked with the logistics provider, and it appears your package was delayed due to a shipping carrier issue. We can expedite a replacement shipment at no extra cost.
Thank you for the update and the offer to resend the package quickly. I appreciate your help resolving this.
We have processed the expedited replacement shipment, and you will receive a new tracking number shortly via email.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your order and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your issue is resolved and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience and business.
